titleStmt.title: A short discovery of the state of man before the fall, in the fall, and out of the fall againe : wherein is also laid open the ignorance and error of Robert Hall, preacher at Colebrooke in Buckinghamshire, and Edmund Board, of the same town, a professor ... / by W.B.
titleStmt.author: Bayly, William, d. 1675.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
